author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Rosehill Resources Says Year-End 2017 Proved Reserves Rose To 31.1 Mln Barrels Of Oil Equivalent, Up 135 Pct From 13.2 MMBOE At Year-End 2016
text:
Jan 18 (Reuters) - Rosehill Resources Inc:
* ROSEHILL RESOURCES INC - YEAR-END 2017 PROVED RESERVES ROSE TO 31.1 MILLION BARRELS OF OIL EQUIVALENT, UP 135% FROM 13.2 MMBOE AT YEAR-END 2016
* ROSEHILL RESOURCES INC - DRILLING ON NEW WHITE WOLF ACQUISITION ACREAGE TO BEGIN IN LATE Q1 OR EARLY Q2 OF 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
